Name: Dungeon & Derision
About the game: Dungeon & Derision is a tactical turn-based game with some gameplay elements taken from the rogue-like genre ! Create your team to explore a mysterious island run by a powerful king ! Encounter random events during your exploration, your choice will be impactful for your heroes ! Permanent death with a system to upgrade definitly your heroes Custom talent tree for each hero, upgrade them according to your play style
